comments.body:
So, we need this in master/2.4/2.3.
cc @jiangxb1987

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +369,373 @@        // "kill" message to be delivered to the executor (10000 * 10ms = 100s allowance for
        // delivery, which should be more than enough).
        Thread.sleep(10)
        taskCancelledSemaphore.acquire()
        executionOfInterruptibleCounter.getAndIncrement()
